messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I get my get-up-and-go from my
Pokémon!Here we go!
KRICKETOT! ZUBAT!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Keep out of the grass or dodge the
eyes of Trainers...?I always have a tough time choosing.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Hey, I remember your face, Trainer.
You’ll battle me again, won’t you?
